entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
